spec_data.Name: perl-DBIx-Class-TimeStamp
spec_data.Description:
Works in conjunction with InflateColumn::DateTime to automatically set
update and create date and time based fields in a table.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:14:35 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: DBIx::Class extension to update and create date and time based fields
